GSD.description:
xen/blkfront: force data bouncing when backend is untrusted

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.322 by commit 8dad9a67100245295373523375610be850999b37. For more details please see the references link.
